meanings.definition: Makes it easier for someone to do something
meanings.sent1: My friend helps me carry my heavy bag home from school.
meanings.sent2: The teacher helps the students understand difficult math problems.
meanings.sent3: The kind neighbor helps the lost puppy find its way back home.
meanings.sent4: Patience helps unlock the door to success.
meanings.sent5: A flashlight helps light up the dark path ahead.

meanings.sent1: The doctor helps patients feel better when they are sick.
meanings.sent2: Volunteers help clean up the park every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cozy blanket helps keep you warm on a chilly night.
meanings.sent4: Laughter helps brighten even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: A map helps guide you to your destination when you are lost.

meanings.definition: Contributes to achieving a goal or purpose
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy foods helps you stay strong and energetic.
meanings.sent2: Teamwork helps the group finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: A good night's sleep helps recharge your body for the next day.
meanings.sent4: Positive thinking helps create a happy and optimistic mindset.
meanings.sent5: Practice helps improve your skills in any activity you choose.
